definition: courtyard house with a fully enclosed courtyard (type of Chinese residence)
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: Siheyuan is the traditional courtyard-style residence of Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 四合院是北京傳統的院落式住宅形式。

sentences.english: The old courtyard houses are very beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 老四合院的房子非常漂亮。

sentences.english: Previous quadrangles have Zhaobi is based on this truth.
sentences.chinese: 以前的四合院，都有照壁就是基於這個道理。

sentences.english: Courtyard is the truck building, a courtyard encircled.
sentences.chinese: 四合院就是東南西北建房，合圍出一個院子。

sentences.english: The brick of the dusty courtyard homes filtered the thunder from the bars. There are very few lights in a hutong at night.
sentences.chinese: 透過四合院的磚牆傳出了裏面喧鬧的酒吧的聲音。

sentences.english: But was there anything better about living in courtyard homes?
sentences.chinese: 那住在四合院裏有哪些好處呢？

sentences.english: Beijing's courtyard there is a hierarchy, is the patriarchal system.
sentences.chinese: 北京的四合院是有等級的，是家長制的。

sentences.english: One of Mr. Li’s earliest childhood memories is of the destruction of his family’s courtyard house.
sentences.chinese: 李先生兒童時期最早的記憶是對他們家四合院的破壞。

sentences.english: Siheyuan - the courtyard residence was a typical housing arrangement in Beijing for hundreds of years.
sentences.chinese: 四合院曾經是北京的一種典型的民居。

sentences.english: Yes. Even the Emperor's Forbidden City is a big "courtyard house".
sentences.chinese: 是啊，連皇帝住的紫禁城也是一個大四合院。

sentences.english: Then you should visit Beijing’s Hutong and Courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 那您應該參觀北京的衚衕和四合院。

sentences.english: In 2009 all its courtyard homes were demolished.
sentences.chinese: 在2009年，這裏所有的四合院都被拆除了。

sentences.english: Outside the gate of some large siheyuan, there is a pair of stone lions on each side.
sentences.chinese: 在門外的一些大型四合院，有一對石獅子，每一邊的。

sentences.english: This is a Chinese courtyard of the compound, exchanging rain, the green.
sentences.chinese: 這是一箇中國四合院式的院落，桃李滿園，綠意盎然。

sentences.english: The Dillon Residence takes the form of a courtyard house typology.
sentences.chinese: 迪倫住宅選取了四合院的佈局。

sentences.english: I'd rather live in a siheyuan. What about you?
sentences.chinese: 我倒願意住在四合院裏，你呢？

definition: residence consisting of structures surrounding a courtyard on three sides
Pingfang district of Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1] in Heilongjiang
compound with many families living together
courtyard/atrium/opening in a roof/skylight/caisson ceiling/(TCM) acupuncture point TB10
